comments.creator: honzab.moz@firemni.cz
comments.author: honzab.moz@firemni.cz
comments.text:
Reasons:
1. I want to land patches for milestone 1 of rel=preload that don't include "fetch" support.  
2. The test gets broken by landing bug 1618299 because dynamic preloading is then functionally different (partly broken) until other bugs in the series are landed.

Instead of trying to land the necessary changes along the affecting patches it seems simpler to disable this test for awhile and reenable in a different bug.
